item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/09/24/favicon-cheat-sheet/#comment-4099">vanhoutte</a>.
I will often just add an empty favicon.ico so that the web server at least has a file match for all of those requests.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to vanhoutte.

I will often just add an empty favicon.ico so that the web server at least has a file match for all of those requests.

item.title: By: vanhoutte
item.dc:creator: vanhoutte
item.description: Awesome, it's too bad many web designers just forget about adding one.
item.content:encoded: Awesome, it’s too bad many web designers just forget about adding one.
